description:
Go forth with the technical wizardry of Patagonia® fabrics. This super-lightweight material is the same used for grown-up base layers, but with fresher, brighter graphics. Great on its own, at the beach, or as a base layer in slightly cooler weather.Made from a lightweight recycled polyester.UPF 50+ sun protection, because kids love sunny playground sessions.HeiQ® Fresh treatment keeps it smelling fresh.Fair Trade Certified sewing.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Daily T-Shirt - Boys' - Children to Youths
